title: Hybrid Teacher Competency Development Program Through Pedagogical Vulnerability Analysis and Concept Mapping

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Blended Learning Program Operated in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Environment. Combines Online Concept Mapping Training with Face-to-Face Workshops to Develop Reflective Teaching Methodologies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze cases of instructional vulnerability and visualize improvement strategies through concept mapping.
Learners can develop instructional design prototypes based on peer feedback in blended learning environments.
Learners can propose a self-reflective instructional model applicable to science education settings through an 8-week PBL project.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
